channel.title: Surfing on pastebin
channel.description:
So i was surfing on pastebin and then i found this from someone of nrpk
1. Dear Justine, Not seeing you for days has been so hard for me. I can't stop thinking about you and the way you make me feel when we played NRPK. Every time I see a dragon longsword I think of you.. I've never felt this way about anyone before, or a dragon longsword. I remember all the talks we used to have in ::di, and how all the noobs would come up to you and ask you questions and you'd be like "Yo! Nigga, shut the fuck up!" It would make me laugh so hard and at the same time it made me fall in love with you. You're such a gangsta bitch and that's the kind of girl I want in my life. When you told me you wear Jordans I was so turned on. I love Michael Jordan and his shoes and girls that wear his shoes. I hope your feet aren't huge like his, hehehe. :P Anyways I was wondering if you wanted to come back to NRPK with me and be my girlfriend. I'm sorry I made you jealous by using that other girl. I was scared of my true feelings for you and the only way I could play it off was by joking around and pushing you away. Every time I login I hope I see "CrazyBitchJustine" is online. I wander the streets of Varrock waiting for you to login. You're the dragon sq to my dragon legs. Without you, I'm just a noob. I'd give anything for you to come back and find me in Varrock. Yesterday I was walking around Falador and I thought I saw you in the General Shop. I rushed in nearly breaking the door down. The shop owners looked at me like I was retarded. Turns out all I saw was a noob in a rune skirt. Justine, please come back to me. Love always, Ray "Godfather" Thomas
Never lol'd so bad

item.title: Surfing on pastebin
item.dc:creator: @I_kasoy_II Sohail
item.description:
@I_kasoy_II wrote:

So i was surfing on pastebin and then i found this from someone of nrpk

1. Dear Justine,

Not seeing you for days has been so hard for me. I can’t stop thinking about you and the way you make me feel when we played NRPK. Every time I see a dragon longsword I think of you… I’ve never felt this way about anyone before, or a dragon longsword. I remember all the talks we used to have in ::di, and how all the noobs would come up to you and ask you questions and you’d be like “Yo! Nigga, shut the fuck up!” It would make me laugh so hard and at the same time it made me fall in love with you. You’re such a gangsta bitch and that’s the kind of girl I want in my life. When you told me you wear Jordans I was so turned on. I love Michael Jordan and his shoes and girls that wear his shoes. I hope your feet aren’t huge like his, hehehe. Anyways I was wondering if you wanted to come back to NRPK with me and be my girlfriend. I’m sorry I made you jealous by using that other girl. I was scared of my true feelings for you and the only way I could play it off was by joking around and pushing you away. Every time I login I hope I see “CrazyBitchJustine” is online. I wander the streets of Varrock waiting for you to login. You’re the dragon sq to my dragon legs. Without you, I’m just a noob. I’d give anything for you to come back and find me in Varrock.

Yesterday I was walking around Falador and I thought I saw you in the General Shop. I rushed in nearly breaking the door down. The shop owners looked at me like I was retarded. Turns out all I saw was a noob in a rune skirt.

Justine, please come back to me.

Love always,

Ray “Godfather” Thomas

Never lol’d so bad
